key.name: screen-off-power-saving
key.summary: Enable power saving when screen is off
key.description: When screen is turned off, try to save as much power as possible.

key.name: bluetooth-power-saving
key.description: Set Bluetooth power saving when screen is off.

key.name: bluetooth-power-saving-blacklist
key.summary: Do not enable Bluetooth power saving if these apps are running
key.description: If applications in list are running, do not enable power saving.

key.name: cpuset-background-processes
key.summary: Move these processes to background cpuset when screen is off
key.description: When screen is turned off, processes in list are moved to background cpuset.

key.name: suspend-services
key.summary: Suspend services when screen is off
key.description: [MAINTAINER] Set blacklist later for this to work.

key.name: suspend-apps-blacklist
key.summary: Do not suspend these apps when screen is off
key.description: When screen is turned off, these apps will be ignored.

key.name: suspend-processes
key.summary: Suspend these processes when screen is off
key.description: When screen is turned off, processes in list are suspended.

key.name: suspend-user-services-blacklist
key.summary: Do not suspend these services when screen is off
key.description: When screen is turned off, these services will be ignored.

key.name: suspend-system-services-blacklist
key.summary: Do not suspend these services when screen is off
key.description: When screen is turned off, these services will be ignored.

key.name: suspend-bluetooth-services
key.description: When screen is turned off and bluetooth is unused, these services will be suspended.

key.name: radio-power-saving
key.description: When screen is turned off, move radio devices to lower data mode.

key.name: devfreq-blacklist
key.summary: [MAINTAINER ONLY] Do not set these devfreq devices to powersave
key.description: Some devfreq devices may hang if so. Use a GLib schema override for your device.

key.name: cpuset-blacklist
key.summary: Do not move these cgroups to any cpuset
key.description: These cgroups will not be moved to any cpuset.

key.name: cpuset-topapp
key.summary: Move these cgroups to top-app cpuset
key.description: These cgroups will be moved to top-app cpuset.
